column2: OMV agrees to sell 30 pct stake in British Rosebank field to Suncor VIENNA
column3: Aug 9 Austrian energy group OMV  has agreed to sell most of its 50 percent stake in the British Rosebank field to Canada's Suncor Energy for as much as $215 million

column2: BRIEF-Intel says to buy Nervana SystemsIntel to buy artificial intelligence firm Nervana Systems Aug 9 Intel Corp said on Tuesday it would acquire startup Nervana Systems as the world's largest chipmaker bolsters its artificial intelligence capabilities.  Intel to buy artificial intelligence firm Nervana Systems Aug 9 Intel Corp said on Tuesday it would acquire startup Nervana Systems as the world's largest chipmaker bolsters its artificial intelligence capabilities. * Signed definitive agreement to acquire Nervana Systems to add to Intel's artificial intelligence portfolio  Source text : http://intel.ly/2bhcVZR Further company coverage:Intel to buy artificial intelligence firm Nervana Systems Aug 9 Intel Corp said on Tuesday it would acquire startup Nervana Systems as the world's largest chipmaker bolsters its artificial intelligence capabilities.
